description: Fan Hyulick is a former Admiral of Euria. At the Battle of Cereberus, Fan Hyulick forces Lord Aryabhata to retreat. Inflicting the first loss the Tytania clan has suffered in 200 years. Fan Hyulick was selected by the Mayor of Euria to lead the Eurian Fleet at the Battle fo Cereberus with the intention of losing the battle. Fan`s unexpected victory forces the mayor to exile Hyulick to appease the Tytania clan. Fan Hyulick currently resides aboard the Honest Old Man, a smuggler ship captained by Mirada Casimir traveling across the universe while attempting to evade the grasp of the Tytania Clan.
name: Fan Hyulick
